Class HttpPosterCommons

public class HttpPosterCommons
extends java.lang.Object

Title : Dialog Util - Dialog R&D Utility library Description : Use to make http POST METHOD requests Copyright : Copyright (c) 2008 Company : Dialog Telekom PLC Department : Group Technology R&D Created On : 01-08-2008

Author:
: Lakthinda Ranasinghe Comments : Modified by Charith on 18-03-2009 to support generic HTTP request & response and including logging

setProxySettings

public void setProxySettings(java.lang.String host,
                             java.lang.String port,
                             java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String password)
If a proxy is needed to make the connection it should be set here.

Parameters:
host - proxy host
port - proxy port
username - if the porxy server needs authntication set the user name using this or if the server does not need authentication leave this as null
password - to authenticate the user name to the proxy server. if the account has no password then leave it as null.

NOTE: if the username or password is set to null then it will be intepretted as an empty string

executeAsHttpRequest

public java.util.HashMap executeAsHttpRequest(java.lang.String URL,
                                              java.util.HashMap reqParameterMap,
                                              java.lang.String request,
                                              java.util.HashMap headerParams)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
Executes the provided request string as a HTTP post request.

Parameters:
URL - the request will be made to this URL
reqParameterMap - this HashMap will contain the list of parameters to send with the request
request - the request string
headerParams - if any header params should be set those values shoud be set using this map. if not set to null
Returns:
a HashMap containing the following values
KeyDescription
responseThe response content returned for the request
responseTimeTime duration between request & response
statusCodeHTTP Status code
errorResponse if error occoured during the process this field will contain the error code.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occoured during the process the resulting exception will be returned to the caller

executeAsWebService

public java.util.HashMap executeAsWebService(java.lang.String URL,
                                             java.util.HashMap reqParameterMap,
                                             java.lang.String request,
                                             java.lang.String contentType,
                                             java.lang.String charSet,
                                             java.util.HashMap headerParams)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Executes the provided request string as a WEB Service request.

Parameters:
URL - the request will be made to this URL
reqParameterMap - this HashMap will contain the list of parameters to send with the request
request - the request string
contentType - The prefered content type of the reqest. REQUEST_CONTENT_TYPE
charSet - The prefered charset of the reqest. REQUEST_CHAR_SET
headerParams - if any header params should be set those values shoud be set using this map. if not set to null
Returns:
a HashMap containing the following values
KeyDescription
responseThe response content returned for the request
responseTimeTime duration between request & response
statusCodeHTTP Status code
errorResponse if error occoured during the process this field will contain the error code.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occoured during the process the resulting exception will be returned to the caller

executeHttp

public java.util.HashMap executeHttp(java.lang.String URL,
                                     java.util.HashMap reqParameterMap,
                                     java.lang.String request,
                                     java.lang.String contentType,
                                     java.lang.String charSet)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
Executes the provided request string as a WEB Service request or a HTTP post request. if the contentType & charSet parameters are set to null then a HTTP post request will be made else the request content will be sent as a RequestEntity

Parameters:
URL - the request will be made to this URL
reqParameterMap - this HashMap will contain the list of parameters to send with the request
request - the request string
contentType - The prefered content type of the reqest. REQUEST_CONTENT_TYPE
charSet - The prefered charset of the reqest. REQUEST_CHAR_SET
Returns:
a HashMap containing the following values
KeyDescription
responseThe response content returned for the request
responseTimeTime duration between request & response
statusCodeHTTP Status code
errorResponse if error occoured during the process this field will contain the error code.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occoured during the process the resulting exception will be returned to the caller

executeHttp

public java.util.HashMap executeHttp(java.lang.String URL,
                                     java.util.HashMap reqParameterMap,
                                     java.lang.String request,
                                     java.lang.String contentType,
                                     java.lang.String charSet,
                                     java.util.HashMap headerParams)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
Executes the provided request string as a WEB Service request or a HTTP post request. if the contentType & charSet parameters are set to null then a HTTP post request will be made else the request content will be sent as a RequestEntity

Parameters:
URL - the request will be made to this URL
reqParameterMap - this HashMap will contain the list of parameters to send with the request
request - the request string
contentType - The prefered content type of the reqest. REQUEST_CONTENT_TYPE
charSet - The prefered charset of the reqest. REQUEST_CHAR_SET
headerParams - if any header params should be set those values shoud be set using this map. if not set to null
Returns:
a HashMap containing the following values
KeyDescription
responseThe response content returned for the request
responseTimeTime duration between request & response
statusCodeHTTP Status code
errorResponse if error occoured during the process this field will contain the error code.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occoured during the process the resulting exception will be returned to the caller
